name: Illuminary
description:
Illuminary is a top-down, 2D, dungeon crawler roguelike that plays a bit like freeze tag. 

You play as a ball of fire making your way through the levels, searching for the key that will lead you to the next one. As you go, you will encounter a variety of different monsters. 

However, you can't kill them. 

Instead, use the power of your light to freeze your enemies and pass through them unharmed. But be careful, because they won't stay frozen for long. 

Unity Webplayer
